content.rendered:
Directed by K.S. Ravindra.

Written by K.S. Ravindra. K. Chakravarthy Reddy. Kona Venkat. Mayank Jain.

Cast N.T. Rama Rao Jr.(Jai / Lava / Kusa (as Junior N.T.R.)). Raashi Khanna(Priya (as Rashi Khanna)). Nivetha Thomas(Simran). Ronit Roy(Sarkaar). Krishna Murali Posani(Jai). Pavitra Lokesh(Jaya). Sai Kumar(Kaka). Pradeep Singh Rawat(Yadagiri). Nassar(Dhanunjay). Abhimanyu Singh(Rudra Tiwari). Harish Uthaman(Tapan). Hamsa Nandini(V A Rajini). Nandita Raj(Sravani). Priyadarshi Pulikonda(Obulesh ‘Obu’ (as Priyadarshi)). Shiju(Priya’s father). Praveen(Kuas’s friend). Jayaprakash Reddy(Sravani’s father). Brahmaji(Rambabu). Prabhas Sreenu(Juthada). Chalapathi Rao(Obulesh’s father). Shatru(Jai’s henchman). Rakesh Varre(Deva). Satya(Ali). Harsha Chemudu(Restaurant Customer (as Viva Harsha)). Sharath Lohitashwa(Misra (cameo appearance) (as Sharath Lohith)). Kedar Shankar(Lava’s guardian). Lakshmi Alapati(Jai’s caretaker). Ravinder Kolishetty(Officer). Vishun(Young Jai / Young Lava / Young Kusa). Vihaan(Young Jai / Young Lava / Young Kusa). Tamannaah Bhatia(in song ‘Swing Zara’).Raghu Kumar Karumanchi.Venu Tillu.Ananth.Hari Mohanakrishna.Bhadram.Isheeka Varma.Sameer.Anitha Nath.Venugopal.Siva Prasad.Ravikanth.Master Sathwik.Nomina Tara.Sunkara Lakshmi.Bommarillu Dhulipala.Bn. Rao.Baajaan.Sandhya Janak.Namala Murthy.Mamilla Shailaja Priya.Lab Sharath

Language Telugu.

Producers Sandeep Gunnam. Kosaraju Harikrishna. Nandamuri Kalyan Ram.

Production NTR Arts.
